nodes.text: A secretary worked for Imperial Remnant Head of State Jagged Fel in the outer area of the Offices of the Imperial Head of State in the Galactic Empire Embassy complex on Coruscant, the capital planet of the Galactic Alliance. The secretary was working in the Offices of the Imperial Head of State when Fel's fiancée, Jedi Knight Jaina Solo, came to visit him. The secretary told Fel that Jedi Solo was there to see him. He told the secretary to let her into his offices.
The secretary appeared briefly in the Fate of the Jedi novel Fate of the Jedi: Conviction, written by Aaron Allston and published on May 24, 2011.
